Room.Name: Tiamat Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the north side of Kista Towers, traveling on Tiamat Lanes.
Room.LongDescription: A formidable wall protects you from the moat at this point. As you look closely, you realize this must be the wall where the moat keepers have installed a maintenance lock so they can do repairs and other necessary duties involving the moat monsters.
